16:07 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> has joined #xwiki  
16:09 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> Hi. Popping in for a quick question. Can xwiki be configured to use an alternate java version (linux machine), or does it check in JAVA\_HOME by default?  
16:16 <ClemensR> xwikiorg\_guest\_5: depends on the installation. is this from the debian installer?  
16:16 <xwikiorg\_guest\_5> The standard jar installer  
16:29 <ClemensR> ah, ok, I guess you have a start script like "start\_xwiki.sh", and you can set a different java to use there ... just like in any ordnary script ...  export JAVA\_HOME=/path/to/your/java; PATH=$JAVA\_HOME/bin:$PATH  
16:29 <ClemensR> just add anything like that at the top of the script
